Recap Map

About

The origin of the project is actually tied to the Falcons NFC title game in 2017. After they won, I made a rap song celebrating the win, complete with audio highlights from the game.

As Atlanta United prepared for their inaugural match on March 5, I decided to the same thing. Now, many matches and late nights later, there's a song for each game in the inaugural season. For more, read the story behind the series, or check out the MLS article on the project.
